Navigate to 'https://www.ecomstore.com/home'
Verify the main header is visible, height 64px, background color #F8F8F8
Verify the 'Products' navigation link displays text 'Products', font size 16px, color #333333, padding 10px 15px
Verify the site logo image source 'logo.svg', rendered dimensions 120x30px, alt text 'EcomStore Logo'
Click the 'Add to Cart' button

Verify the button is disabled, opacity 0.7, background color #CCCCCC, text 'Adding...', font weight 600, border radius 4px, width 150px, height 40px, aria-label 'Adding product to cart', with a transition effect for 300ms
Focus the 'Search Query' input field

Verify the input field gains focus state, border 2px solid #007bff, placeholder text 'Search for products...' is visible, font family 'Arial', padding 8px, left position 20px, top position 100px, and associated label text 'Search'
Open 'https://www.travelsite.com/gallery/paris'

Verify the main 'Eiffel Tower' image source 'eiffel_tower.jpg', natural dimensions 1920x1080px, rendered dimensions 800x450px, loads within 1500ms, alt text 'Eiffel Tower at sunset', no watermark, width 800px, and is horizontally centered on the page
View the 'Dashboard' activity log
Verify the activity count is exactly 15 entries
Verify each log entry has bottom border 1px solid #EEEEEE, padding 12px 16px, margin-bottom 8px
Verify the 'Mark as Read' button in each entry has background color #28A745, font size 14px, text color #FFFFFF, width 100px, and is enabled
Start playback of the 'Welcome Video'
Verify the video player is visible, muted state is false, width 640px, height 360px
Verify the 'Fullscreen' button is enabled
Verify the video player control bar has background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7)
Verify the 'Play' icon's color is #FFFFFF
Verify the current duration text is '0:05'
Click 'Open Confirmation Dialog'
Verify the modal dialog is visible, background color #FFFFFF, border radius 8px, width 400px, height 250px, top-left coordinates 300, 400
Verify the 'Confirm' button has text color #FFFFFF, font size 16px, opacity 1, and aria-label 'Confirm Action'
Hover over the 'Privacy Policy' link

Verify the link's text color changes to #0056B3, background color changes to #F0F0F0, an underline becomes visible, font weight 500, padding 5px 0px, left position 10px, right position 10px, and text content 'Privacy Policy'
Submit the contact form without filling required fields

Verify the error message 'Please fill all required fields.' is visible, text color #DC3545, font size 14px, background color #F8D7DA, border 1px solid #DC3545, margin-top 10px, and aria-label 'Form submission error'
Click the 'Billing Info' tab
Verify the 'Billing Info' tab is active/selected, background color #E0E0E0, text color #333333, bottom border 3px solid #007BFF, and padding 12px 20px
Verify the 'Payment History' tab (inactive) has font color #666666, font weight 400, top position 0, bottom position 0
Click the 'Next' arrow on the image carousel
Verify the new slide image has source 'product_image_02.jpg', loads within 400ms, displays with opacity 1, width 600px, height 400px
Confirm an animation duration of 300ms for the slide transition
Verify the 'Previous' arrow is enabled
Verify there are 3 pagination indicators
Click the 'Select Region' dropdown

Verify each dropdown item has padding 8px 12px
